name: bizosaas-ux-testing-framework
description: Comprehensive UX Testing Framework for BizOSaaS Platform Ecosystem

scripts.test:accessibility: node -e "const UXFramework = require('./ux-testing-framework'); const f = new UXFramework(); f.initializeBrowser().then(() => f.testPlatformAccessibility('clientPortal'))"
scripts.test:mobile: node -e "const UXFramework = require('./ux-testing-framework'); const f = new UXFramework(); f.initializeBrowser().then(() => f.testResponsiveDesign('coreldove'))"
scripts.test:journeys: node -e "const UXFramework = require('./ux-testing-framework'); const f = new UXFramework(); f.initializeBrowser().then(() => f.testUserJourney('productPurchase'))"

author: BizOSaaS UX Research Team
